name: Deep Black
description:
Deep Black lets players experience for the first time the thrills of a third person action shooter in an underwater setting. The unique story and locales of Deep Black combines action-packed battles with an immersive narrative, one of complex science-fiction mystery, espionage and bio-terror. Realistic physics in an underwater environment offers gamers new “depths” to in-game challenges in Deep Black. Players will take to the murky depths armed with a range of underwater equipment from specialized underwater jet packs with integrated harpoons, mini submersibles and other high-tech equipment in pursuit of enemies. With the majority of the game play taking place below the water’s surface, action-adventure fans will need to master new skills to fight hostile enemies and infiltrate enemy bases.
